features: 24HR RENEWING MICROMOISTURE: Dove Hypoallergenic Sensitive Skin Body Wash gently cleanses and nourishes the skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours
FOR SOFT, SMOOTH SKIN: Dove Hypoallergenic Body Wash for sensitive skin is formulated with millions of MicroMoisture droplets, and leaves skin soft as silk
HYPOALLERGENIC: This gentle skin cleanser, with a hypoallergenic formula soothes dryness
HOW TO USE: Squeeze a generous amount of Dove Hypoallergenic Body Wash into your palms. Massage the nourishing body wash onto your skin, taking a moment to enjoy the rich lather before rinsing off

DERMATOLOGIST-RECOMMENDED BODY WASH BRAND: From the dermatologist-recommended body wash brand, this body wash, made with plant-based moisturizers, gently cleanses your skin and nourishes its microbiome
body.description: Nourish your skin senses with Dove Hypoallergenic Body Wash for sensitive skin. This nourishing body wash, with 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture, gently cleanses and nourishes the skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours. From the No.1 dermatologist-recommended body wash brand, this nourishing body wash has a luxurious lather you'll love to use in the shower after a long day. Dove Hypoallergenic Body Wash has been developed with millions of MicroMoisture droplets and plant-based moisturizers, creating a formula that works to gently cleanse and moisturize skin and nourish your microbiome – skin's living protective layer. As a specially designed body wash for soft skin, your skin will feel as soft as it looks. This nourishing body wash also has a 98% biodegradable formula*. *98% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water and minerals (OECD test methods 301, 302 and/or 310). This gentle skin cleanser is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles, vegan, and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world, so you can feel good about switching to Dove. Plus, this hydrating body wash is made without sulfates or parabens.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Sensitive Skin Body Wash, formulated with millions of MicroMoisture droplets, nourishes skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours. This gentle skin cleanser is infused with a hypoallergenic formula which soothes dryness .

Change is Beautiful Our best-ever Dove body wash, now with a new look. Experience the Power of MicroMoisture Our new patented body wash deposits millions of tiny moisturizing droplets that absorb deeply into the nooks and crevices of dry skin. Gentle and Moisturizing Body Wash Made with 100% gentle cleansers, no sulfates and no parabens, Dove body wash is gentle to your skin's microbiome and regenerates moisture for 24 hours of silky-soft skin. Choose Your Favorite Dove has a range of body washes for everyone and every skin type. Choose Dove daily for smooth, nourished skin.

Dove Sensitive Skin Body Wash, 34 oz Dove Shower Foam Sensitive Skin Foaming Body Wash, 13.5 oz Dove Sensitive 0% Aluminum Deodorant, 2.6 oz Main Benefit This hypoallergenic body wash gently cleanses and nourishes skin, leaving it soft and moisturized. This self-foaming body wash pump provides a light lather for sensitive skin. This deodorant stick with 0% aluminum provides 48-hour odor protection and long-lasting freshness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shower wash, not great for bubble bath, unscented but NOT fragrance free
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for years. It’s great for dry skin or eczema.It may not eliminate the need for body lotion after your shower, but it is much milder than most liquid body soaps. It’s a great, affordable sulfate/paraben-free option.A few notes:1) It is “unscented” but not “fragrance free.” There is a very light fragrance added to mask the scent of the other ingredients. It smells pleasantly neutral & doesn’t linger. But if you truly need fragrance free products for allergy reasons, this ain’t it.2) It does not lather as well as other body washes, due to added moisturizers and lack of sulfates. It will still leave you feeling clean and fresh.3) Do not try to use it as a bubble bath. It won’t make bubbles at all. I still take baths with it, but I find that I have to first dispense it into a dish and swish it together with a little water before adding it to the bath. Otherwise “chunks” of product float in the water and it’s gross.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for people with sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: It's not the greatest product, but it's affordable and doesn't irritate my skin. I find that it moisturizes well too. It also smells clean and not overbearing. Great body wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells so good
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this body wash exclusively for over a decade as I have very sensitive skin. I love how it lathers, the smell is light but very pleasant, and one bottle lasts a long time though I shower twice a day with it. Excellent quality!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🚿 "Gentle Care for Sensitive Skin: Dove Body Wash with Pump" 🚿 Review:
reviews.reviewText: 🌟 Attention, sensitive skin warriors! The Dove Body Wash with Pump is here to provide gentle care for your delicate skin. Specifically formulated for sensitive skin, this hypoallergenic body wash is a game-changer, offering a paraben-free and sulfate-free cleansing experience. Get ready for a nourishing and soothing shower routine! 🌟🌼 Top 5 Takeaways 🌼1️⃣ Sensitive Skin Formula: This body wash is designed with the needs of sensitive skin in mind. Its gentle formula is specifically created to cleanse without causing irritation or dryness, making it suitable for those with sensitive or easily irritated skin.2️⃣ Hypoallergenic and Dermatologist-Tested: Dove understands the importance of providing products that are safe for sensitive skin. This body wash is hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested, ensuring that it is gentle and non-irritating, even for the most sensitive skin types.3️⃣ Paraben and Sulfate-Free: With its paraben-free and sulfate-free formula, this body wash provides a worry-free cleansing experience. It is free from harsh chemicals that can strip the skin of its natural moisture, helping to maintain its healthy balance.4️⃣ Nourishing and Moisturizing: Along with gentle cleansing, this body wash nourishes and moisturizes the skin. Its unique formula contains mild cleansers and natural ingredients that help to replenish moisture, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated.5️⃣ Convenient Pump Design: The inclusion of a pump dispenser makes this body wash even more convenient to use. It allows for easy and mess-free dispensing, making your shower routine a breeze.⭐ Pros ⭐✅ Specifically formulated for sensitive skin.✅ Hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested.✅ Free from parabens and sulfates.✅ Nourishes and moisturizes the skin.✅ Convenient pump design for easy dispensing.⛔ Cons ⛔❌ Some may prefer a stronger fragrance option.❌ The pump design may not be ideal for travel or on-the-go use.🌟 In summary, the Dove Body Wash with Pump is a fantastic choice for those with sensitive skin who seek a gentle and nourishing cleansing experience. Its hypoallergenic formula, free from parabens and sulfates, provides a worry-free shower routine that leaves your skin feeling refreshed and moisturized. Embrace the care your sensitive skin deserves with this exceptional body wash! 🌟

reviews.reviewText: What i like about this soap is that it makes my skin feels so soft and have my body smelling so good.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sensitive body wash
reviews.reviewText: I love the pump and the amount you get with this size bottle. It has a light scent and is perfect for sensitive skin, I have always trusted dove when it came down to that factor alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove sensitive skin body wash
reviews.reviewText: I love this body wash. I have used it for so many years now. This size with the convenient pump is awesome. Really worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This soap is reliably gentle on my sensitive skin and is moisturizing without making my skin feel greasy. It does not have a heavy fragrance. It's very thick, and a little goes a long way. The viscosity does make it a bit tough to get the last bit out of the bottle. I used to buy this at the grocery store but found it's less expensive per unit to buy this set of three bottles on Amazon.

reviews.reviewTitle: LIGHT GENTLE SCENT FREE MOISTURIZING WASH FOR SENSITIVE SKIN.
reviews.reviewText: Dove Gentle Nourish and Senstive body wash is best at light moisturizing all season long and when heavy feeling or scents are not needed. Very thick. Modererate lather. Very mild clean scent. Very tight top. Easy to squeeze out until bottle last third left. Premium price for quality product. Great add-on price cant be beat. Always used Dove before for sensitive skin and it works well.
He estado usando esto durante años y funciona perfectamente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Why is this only available as an import from America ...
reviews.reviewText: Why is this only available as an import from America? Even with the costs doubled due to shipping, it is still as cheap or cheaper than the few alternatives, For those with skin sensitive to chemicals and perfumes, this works very well, and there are too few UNSCENTED sensitive skin products available.
I live by this body wash, amazing and so good on sensitive skin
